events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
System has identified the issue as a refund request based on customer message keywords.
Customer support agent Julia has been assigned to handle the refund request.
Hello, I’m Julia from support. I understand you want a refund for the wrong item you received. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the product you received, so we can process your refund efficiently?
Here is my order number 4567890 and attached is the photo showing that the item is completely different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days. You do not need to return the incorrect item.
I appreciate the quick response and that I don’t have to return the wrong item. Thank you for resolving this quickly.
Refund has been initiated and the issue is now resolved on our end. Please allow a few days for the amount to reflect in your account.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory. Let us know if you need any further help.
As we have not heard back from you and the refund period has passed, we are closing your case. Feel free to contact us again anytime.
